p: Five accessions of A. rosiodora, including two from RESEX, one from FLONA, one from Presidente Figueiredo, and one from Manaus, as well as A. hypoglauca Sandwith and A. cinnamomiflora C.K. Allen were included in the phylogenetic analysis. Ocotea quixos (Lam.) Kosterm. was included as an outgroup. Voucher information and GenBank accession numbers are listed in Table 2.
